sentence.Network_en: We didn't know what to do with Knudsen until good old Henry picked him up.
sentence.Network_cn: 在亨利这位好老头把努森收容起来之前,我们真不知拿他怎么办.

sentence.Network_en: Faced with an Irish rally, he was ready to submit himself to his sovereign, King Henry.
sentence.Network_cn: 面对着爱尔兰联军的威胁, 他打算顺从自己的君主英王亨利.

sentence.Network_en: The largest college, Trinity, was founded by King Henry III in 1546.
sentence.Network_cn: 最大的三一学院则是由国王亨利三世在1546年建立的.

means.word_mean: 1. European plant naturalized in North America; often collected from the wild as a potherb
